name: Easy Field Hockey LT
description:
This is the fantastic Field Hockey game for you and your friends. Compete your family and friends and get 5 goals to win. And if no human player available you can play agains your device. Your device can play in three modes: Easy - Medium - and Hard.

Features:
-1 Player mode vs device (Easy, Medium and Hard)
-2 Player mode
-Realistic sound effects
-Cool graphics

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.
